Report for Solar Power Predictions for Ema - October 7th, 2023 - 15:00 hours

Based on our predictions, the solar power generated by your solar panels at 15:00 hours on October 7th, 2023, will be high. The predicted value is 10.143 kilo Watts.

This high power generation can be attributed to the positive contribution of dewpoint. Therefore, you can use your dishwasher and air conditioner without worrying about exceeding the generated power.

However, it is important to note that the appliance water heater will definitely exceed the generated power. Therefore, we recommend minimizing its usage during this time.

Thank you.

Best regards,
Tenergito

Dear Ana,

We hope this message finds you well. As one of our valued solar panel clients, we want to keep you informed about the predicted solar power that will be generated from your panels.

According to our analysis, on June 8th, 2023 at 4:00 PM, you can expect a medium amount of solar power to be generated, with a predicted value of 2.8 kilo Watts. However, we would like to inform you that this prediction is affected by the current temperature, which is expected to have a negative impact.

We recommend that you use your heater during this time, as it will not exceed the generated power. However, we caution against using your washing machine as it might exceed the generated power. Additionally, your air conditioner will definitely surpass the generated power, so we advise against using it during this time.

We hope this report helps you plan your energy usage and make the most of the solar power generated by your panels. As always, please do not hesitate to contact us if you have any questions or concerns.

Sincerely,

Tenergito
